thread.section_title: Crowne Plaza London Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Weekend away
thread.title_full: Weekend away - Review of Crowne Plaza London Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Cork67
title: Weekend away
text: We found that the Suite rooms were good for families. Very quiet on the 6th floor and with 2 adults & 2 teens in 2 doubles the space worked well. Also very useful to be able to access club room area for breakfast, snacks etc. The lobby area is a good space to meet people and the gardens nice feature.
